ists?

I'm wri=
ting a perl script to do this.  It currently uses BAT to read the archives =
and builds a directory tree. I'm about to start work a URL-mangling phase (=
i.e. converting all URLs in the page into relative links to local files).  =
I can post a copy when I'm done if anyone is interested.
